# P3D sketch warnings with jdk12, JRuby-9.2.8.0 and JRubyArt-2.2.0

## sketch

```ruby
def settings
  size 200, 200, P3D
end

def setup
  sketch_title 'P3D Sketch'
end

def draw

end
```

### java_args

```bash
--illegal-access=warn
```
